page with difficulties:

The page isn't live, so if you can't see it, see the attached screenshot.

Also, here is the current live page where the same 3-column module is working in conjunction with another 3-column module:
<https://www.trimetisls.com/who-we-are>
<@U05DA1GV75E> Remove this Max-width from 3 columns and 4 columns module
And add same in 4 column module but inside of scope_css

HHi everyone!

Can i use custom modules in the new cta featured (beta)?

Without looking too deep into it: You have the same css selectors for both modules, so the one that comes later in the view will define which css gets applied. So if you would swap the order you would see a different situation.

best solution would be to give one of the two modules a variant class name instead of using the same classes in both. This would have to happen in the module.html and the module.css files to work as intended.

But Rushik seems to already have found a quick fix to solve it - just for the future you should make sure your css works ONLY for the modules you intend to.
<@U022YD6LGAU> thank you for your advice! I made the changes in module.css, but I'm not sure what you mean about adding inside scope_css
Wrap style inside <style>{% scope_css %}  *Here add styles* {% end_scope_css %} </style>
Make sure to add it in html section below html <@U05DA1GV75E>

Hello!

Looking for some insight on the best way to implement an image gallery module on CRM Object Dynamic Pages. From setting up the module to inserting it into the dynamic page code.

Thanks!
